function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing of COVID-19 data may breach privacy and security of the individuals","Impact":"Privacy violations and security breaches","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection measures and encryption protocols","Technologies":"Blockchain technology, secure cloud-based platforms","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare professionals, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of privacy as infection status is shown to all","Impact":"Violation of privacy, potential discrimination, and stigmatization","Mitigation":"Implement strict access controls and anonymization of data","Technologies":"Secure authentication systems, encrypted communication channels","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare professionals, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Rapid diagnosis of COVID-19 patients lack of quality test","Impact":"Inaccurate diagnosis and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Improvement of testing quality and accuracy, implementation of confirmatory tests","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostic technologies, laboratory equipment automation","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, diagnostic laboratories"}]}
